# Agent 3 Tasks: Documentation Specialist

## Agent Role

**Primary Focus:** Complete and finalize all documentation, tutorials, and ensure all code examples work with the new crate structure and naming.

## Key Responsibilities

- Review and finalize generated documentation files (README, QUICK_START, DEV_SETUP)
- Fix tutorial inconsistencies, especially session management tutorial
- Ensure all documentation examples use correct crate name and imports
- Verify all code examples compile and work correctly
- Create comprehensive documentation for the open source release
